text:
Message 1315 of 4024
She said the meeting was only with Adrian all in caps. She said when did not communicate with you. She did communicate with you. That was a lie.
But that is not the point, I’m trying to figure out how you and I work together so I can be a good dad to the boys. Finally, her being a liar is not that
big a deal.
This is ultimately up to you and I . and I’m trying to understand whether you want to re-litigate all this and I need to go back to my attorney and start
over or if you and I want to figure out how I can see the boys in a safe and healthy way.
I’m honestly not having an angry moment, so I hope it doesn’t come across in text that way . I am honestly in sincerely just trying to work with you
on our plan.
Sent:02/10/2024 at 05:13 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/10/2024 at 05:14 PM)
Subject:Re: Password
Message 1316 of 4024
I’m going to walk away from this and evaluate my next steps.
I have tried to work on a parenting plan with you in good faith without involving parent evaluator or GA, despite what it appears to be the best
course.
I’m not threatening like you but at some point we need to admit it’s not working.
Sent:02/10/2024 at 05:17 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/10/2024 at 05:17 PM)
Subject:Re: Password
Message 1317 of 4024
Wait, I’m not threatening you at all.
I am trying to work with you. I am doing the opposite of what you were saying. I have said over and over I’m not trying to do anything but work with
you .
But what I’m hearing is your threatening me now . Is that what you’re doing because I don’t want that Christine. I want to work with you please.
Please don’t bail on this thread. This is super important to me Christine.
Sent:02/10/2024 at 05:18 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/10/2024 at 05:20 PM)
Subject:Re: Password
